clip_title: That bitter cynicism of yours is something you've acquired since you left Radcliffe
transcript:
Lloyd Richards:
That bitter cynicism of yours is something you've acquired since you left Radcliffe! 
Karen:
The cynicism you refer to, I acquired the day I discovered I was different from little boys! | That bitter cynicism is something you've acquired since you left Radcliffe That cynicism I acquired the day I discovered I was different from little boys
